text: Wo ceng shi feng gong su lai man qushi, feng zai shangwu luxing yi yue de lucheng, zai xiawu ye luxing yi yue de lucheng. Wo wei ta shi rong tong xiang quanshui yiyang yong chu. Youxie jingling feng zhu de mingling zai ta de mianqian gongzuo; shei weibeile wo de mingling, wo jiu shi shei changshi liehuo de xingfa
